job_tasks.phrase: develop our foundational model for video generation
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and development of a core model for video generation, which is a central aspect of generative AI modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: pushing the boundaries and going beyond existing SOTA solutions
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a focus on advancing model capabilities and performance, which falls under the umbrella of modeling research and development.

job_tasks.phrase: Adapting off-the-shelf solutions for the purposes of our product
job_tasks.justification: This involves modifying existing models or solutions to fit specific product needs, a common task in model development and customization.

job_tasks.phrase: help build the academic contributions in this area
job_tasks.justification: While research-oriented, building academic contributions often involves writing and releasing code or systems, which aligns with software development aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: Building libraries to accelerate our iteration speed during development (abstracting common functionality, automating tests sweeps, visualising results etc.)
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation of reusable code and automation tools, which are core software development practices.
This explicitly states the requirement for building high-quality, production-ready software.

job_tasks.phrase: our teams work "full stack" with the ability to deliver direct to product and impact the world
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a broad software development responsibility, from backend to frontend, with a focus on product delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: optimising for deployment - turning prototypes into working solutions
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of taking early-stage models or code (prototypes) and making them functional for deployment, a key software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Taking ownership of the full ML lifecycle from concept, development, testing, validation to deployment
job_tasks.justification: This encompasses the entire lifecycle of an ML model, including deployment and operational aspects, aligning with MLOps principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Our aim is to make video content creation available for all - not only to studio production!
job_tasks.justification: This phrase articulates the overarching business goal and vision for the product, indicating an understanding of business context.

job_tasks.phrase: Designing the requirements, project scoping and owning the roadmap in your area.
job_tasks.justification: This involves defining what needs to be built and how it aligns with strategic direction, which requires business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Managing the progress of the Large Video Model project and making sure that it is in line with our vision.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves aligning project execution with the broader company vision, demonstrating business context awareness.

soft_skills.phrase: passion for working on cutting edge problems
love to code and build working systems
used to working in a fast-paced start-up environment
experience with the software development life cycle, from ideation through implementation, to testing and release
Designing the requirements, project scoping and owning the roadmap in your area.
Managing the progress of the Large Video Model project
Taking ownership of the full ML lifecycle
opportunity to collaborate with multiple research teams

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with generative models (DALL.E, Stable Diffusion, etc.) for text-to-video synthesis and the development of foundational models in this domain. It requires building production-quality software around these generative AI capabilities, including managing the ML lifecycle and adapting existing solutions.
